meanings.definition: To have a strong feeling of wanting something.
meanings.sent1: She was desiring a new bike for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: He is desiring a delicious meal after a long day at work.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was desiring to play fetch with its favorite toy.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were desiring the warmth of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The student was desiring to learn more about the fascinating topic.

meanings.definition: To wish or long for something.
meanings.sent1: They were desiring a peaceful vacation by the beach.
meanings.sent2: She often finds herself desiring a simpler life in the countryside.
meanings.sent3: The cat was desiring to catch the elusive red dot on the floor.
meanings.sent4: The bird was desiring to soar high in the open sky.
meanings.sent5: The child was desiring to have a new toy to play with.
